comment.p: You can view the contents of the ZIPs for ClrMamePro and RomCenter.

revision.comment: Added Nebula Model 2 and removed Zinc (v1.0 recently released).
Added NeoJukeBox and QPlayer. Added missing SHA1 information to Modeler (full sets).
Added SHA1 information.

Added S11Emu, CottAGE, Final Burn and Viva Nonno.
ROM redumps affect GalEmu, Hoot and NeoRAGEx.
Added Calice, Laser, Mimic, Modeler, Sega System 24, U64Emu, Zinc, Hoot and TinyEmu to the archive.
Added ACE, SledgeHammer, YAAME and GXP to the archive.

Removed reference to the non-existent neogeo resource from Gekko Teaser.
Removed duplicated ROMs from MMSnd v0.36b10,
and Ben Jos added years, improved manufacturer names and corrected some bad CRCs.
Changed title of vf2a (it is not Revision A) in Virtua.
Added ThunderForce AC (Bootleg) to ROMBuild for Sega System C2 Emulator v0.2b,
and replaced the bad dump of 1.bin with the good dump from MAME v0.63 (bit 7 was stuck).
Added Mikie and SiEmu v1.03 (although these emulators are recent, the dats can live here!).

Removed U64Emu 1+2 (it is now new again)!
Added MultiPac v0.8, Lady Bug Arcade Machine Emulator v0.5,
Mr. Do! Arcade Machine Emulator and Pengo Arcade Machine Emulator v0.5.

Updated Retrocade v1.2 b2 and EMU v2.3 to use the new Black Widow dump in MAME v0.61.
Finished the Cinelator 95 Beta dat.
Changed V2 sound ROM in NeoRAGEx's Savage Reign to match MAME v0.61.
Removed redundant merge information from RAGE v0.9, VAntAGE v1.11, Gekko Teaser.
Added MMSnd v0.36b10 and U64Emu 1+2.

Updated VAntAGE to use the new Crush Roller colour PROM of MAME v0.60.
Also updated JAS, JAS-Dig Dug 2 and Retrocade to use the new Dig Dug 2 colour PROM of MAME v0.60.
Updated JAS, JAS-Dig Dug 2 and Retrocade to use the new Dig Dug 2 colour PROM of MAME v0.59.
Updated VAntAGE and GalEmu to use the new Pisces colour PROM.
Slightly modified wjammers in NeoRAGEx.
Added The NewZealand Story, Callus (Patched), SNAMEW and tROMbone as they are all over six months old now.
Changed Psychic Force sample ROM in the Impact data file (Impact sets contain a bad dump).
Modified Retrocade and NeoRAGEx to use new dumps in MAME v0.56.
Added Toki. Removed Laser and NeoJukeBox. Modified NeoRAGEx.
Added Laser 0.16, VAntAGE 1.11 and made a variety of changes (see included text file).
Added Speed Freak CRCs to Cinelator 95 dat.
Moved dat for Virtua into the archive.
Moved dats for Sega System 16 Emulator, VisualAM and WinGorf into the archive.
Changed the Impact dat for RomCenter 2 (wasn't being handled as intended).
Updated Xevious Emulator and HiVE dats (see notes within archive).
Updated QPlayer, NeoJukeBox, Rockulator++, Replay, RAGE and SonSon dats (see notes within archive).
Updated QSound Player, QPlayer, NeoJukeBox and NeoRAGEx dats (see notes within archive).
Removed VAntAGE v1.0 and converted all dats to to ROMCenter 2 format.
A few minor changes (see readme).
Fixed kotm in NeoRAGEx dat (MAME ROMs).
Added 14 new dats (see included notes).
Initial Release.
